column4: i am already using dapper, and want to knwo eather i need to download and re-install it using the 6.06.1 CD
or will my current dapper be up to date?
as long as you run the updating tool then your system will be up to date.
The reason for the 6.06.1 release is so that people won't have to update that many packages on their newly installed system afaik.
